comment.body:
Even after being logged into the Netgear Orbi app (by disabling AG), with AG enabled, when I go into 'Account Management' in the Orbi application, I get an error "You are not connected to the internet. Check your internet connection.."
I have to go into the Account Management section to logout to continue testing what in AG is blocking access.

I tried disabling Stealth Mode in AG - no change.
I went into DNS Filtering and disabled DNS Requests blocking - no change
I've set DNS to Cloudflare and Cloudflare for Families (thus bypassing my local Adguard Home DNS) - no change
I've tried disabling individual groups of filters - Ad Blocking, Privacy, Security, Annoyances, Custom, as well as turning them all off at the same time, but nothing unblocks accessing the Netgear account management or login/logoff pages.

As soon as I disable AG, I can get into the Account Management section and login and logout.

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://howtowriteabookthatsells.com/how-to-copyright-a-pen-name/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhowtowriteabookthatsells.com%2Fhow-to-copyright-a-pen-name%2F) ### Comment > This annoyance is so rife on the internet, I beg you to do something in AdGuard to curb it. When moving your mouse cursor away from the page, perhaps towards one's browser toolbar, a desperate pop-up appears begging you not to leave. Adguard is powerless against this because they use a javascript lightbox to darken the page and their message sits on top of it. If you use AdGuard to suppress the message (elements) the lightbox element remains. Then you cannot suppress it or interact with the page anymore. So frustrating! ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.44.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other(specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.forcetools-kepmar.eu/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

ForceTools-Kepmar.eu - Broken (Easylist Cookie List / Fanboy's Annoyance List) [GDPR]

### Affected site:
`https://www.forcetools-kepmar.eu/`

### Issue:
Grey modal overlay / unclickable items.

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:

`##.cookie-consent-content`

`~muenchner-bank.de,~vbleos.de,~vrdh.de,~vrbsaale-unstrut.de,~vrbrm.de,~vrblausitz.de,~vrbanksn.de,~vrbanklm.de,~vrbank-westkueste.de,~vrbank-suedoldenburg.de,~vrbank-osnordland.de,~vrbank-oldenburgland.de,~vrbank-hsh.de,~vrbank-enz-plus.de,~vrbank-eg.de,~vrbank-bamberg-forchheim.de,~vrbank-altenburgerland.de,~vr-teilhaberbank.de,~vr-sl-mh.de,~vr-obm.de,~vr-mio.de,~vr-banking-app.de,~vr-bank-westmuensterland.de,~vr-bank-hm.de,~vr-bank-bonn.de,~volksbank-rhein-lippe.de,~volksbank-rhede.de,~volksbank-raiffeisenbank-regensburg-schwandorf.de,~volksbank-mn.de,~voba-rhein-erft-koeln.de,~vbvorpommern.de,~vbsila.de,~skatbank.de,~raiffeisenbank-im-breisgau.de,~raiffeisen-volksbank-aschaffenburg.de,~gestalterbank.de,~fehntjer-voba.de,~eu-banking.de,~litebit.eu,~raiba-ke-oa.de##.cookie-consent:not(body):not(html)`

### Possible fix:

```
forcetools-kepmar.eu#@#.cookie-consent-content
forcetools-kepmar.eu#@#.cookie-consent:not(body):not(html)
```

### Other problem filters:
* ~~**Easylist Cookie List** / **Fanboy's Annoyance List** https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/13690/~~ _(FIXED)_

~~`##.cookie-consent-content`
`##.cookie-consent-header`
`##div.cookie-consent`~~

* ~~**Frellwit's Swedish Filter** https://github.com/lassekongo83/Frellwits-filter-lists/issues/144/~~ _(FIXED)_

~~`##.cookie-consent:not(body):not(html)`~~

* **I don't care about cookies** _(NOTIFIED)_

`##.cookie-consent-content`
`##.cookie-consent-header`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v105.0.3-1 (x64)
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.44.4

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Setting cookie alone was sadly not enough, they require a site-reload, so clicking on any item works (they reload the page themselves after clicking).

Yeah, that seems to be the case if you click "**Accept required**".
But if you click "**Accept all**", the page reloads immediately!

My main concern is why the redirects happen at all, this issue sort of happened all of a sudden. I had it before (like a year ago) and it stopped and now its back. issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.51

issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

---

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
